posts.post_content:
Want to make some room in my collection for some new cards, making these available.

Mainly looking to sell, but I would consider trades for other HOFers.

"I'll take it" takes precedent over any negotiations via PM or email, which is [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Shipping included to make it easy, prices are PayPal F&F otherwise add 3% for the fee.

More pics available on request.


Beckley Sovereign 350 PSA 5 - $700 (this is not slabbed with the back, but this specific back is a POP 3 with only 2 higher)
Huggins Portrait Cycle PSA 6 - $1,850 (this is a POP 3 with none higher)
McGraw No Cap Portrait Piedmont 150 F25 SGC 50 - $350
Willis Bat Polar Bear SGC 3 - $200


Bender Portrait Sweet Cap 150 F30 SGC 40 - $SOLD
.

Huggins Cycle - $1850
